about_the_game:
Step into the dark Middle Age world as a novice witch. Develop survival skills, brew potions, and hone your witchcraft. Rebuild your home, summon companions from outer worlds and join the Cult of Witcher for powerful magic. Balance village life with battling threats to preserve your granny's legacy.





Create and customize your character. But don't worry, after starting the game, you'll have the chance to change your outfit and even your character's appearance if you can pay the price, of course!





Gather rare ingredients and use ancient alchemy methods to extract their effects. With these skills, you can craft potions for your own use or put them up for sale, creating powerful and unique mixtures that meet your customers' needs. You can even use these concoctions on yourself!





Craft potions and decorate your shop to attract a steady flow of customers. By fulfilling special potion requests, you'll not only boost your reputation but also build lasting customer loyalty. Create an inviting atmosphere and offer personalized solutions to keep your customers coming back.





Use your potions to fight enemies or protect yourself in dangerous encounters. As you master the dark arts of the witch cult, you'll be able to summon powerful creatures from otherworldly realms to aid you. Plan your strategy wisely, as sometimes the best way to survive is to retreat from a battle.





Earn money and complete quests to gain opportunities to upgrade and expand your base. As you progress, you'll have the chance to prepare and refine potions more efficiently, manage your ingredients effectively to maximize your profits, and enhance your brewing skills.





Withstand the harsh conditions of four seasons in a dynamic open world. Adapt to the constantly changing environment, overcome environmental challenges, and manage resource shortages to survive and thrive despite obstacles.



Witchcraft Tales invites you on a journey full of secrets in the dark and mysterious world of the Middle Ages.
In this world, you embark on a journey not just as an ordinary traveler, but as a master of craftsmen and alchemists. With each step, you will develop your skills, uncover the unknown, and encounter the dark side of commerce. But remember, the road to success is always rugged and full of dangers.
As you forge your own path, you will discover new plants, blend materials, craft impressive potions, and trade in secret markets.

Each customer brings a new challenge but also offers an opportunity to make your name known and prove your mastery. As you traverse the depths of enchanted forests, ancient knowledge, and dark secrets of witches await you. However, you must always stay one step ahead of the Inquisition, which shadows your every move.

Witchcraft Tales challenges players to strategize, think, and discover new things at every turn with its unique game mechanics, infused with magic and mystery. In a realistically designed world rich in details, meticulously crafted quests and levels await you. Are you ready to step into this unforgettable experience, whether alone or with your best team?




Experience the game through your own eyes. Feel every moment, every detail, as if you were truly in the depths of the Middle Ages.


Embark on an exciting journey through realistically designed maps and multiple levels. Feel as if you are in the real world with every step. The quality of visuals invites you to a mesmerizing experience. Live the dark atmosphere of the Middle Ages in the most striking way.


Roam freely in a world without boundaries. New discoveries await you at every corner. Write your own story and leave your mark on this world.


Complete quest lines of the Cult of Witches, Inquisiton, Bandits or Outer Worlds as a lone wolf or with your friends through the co-op mode. Combine your strengths to overcome greater challenges.


It's up to you to increase and even produce higher-quality plants from the ones you've gathered. Use the seeds and waste from the plants you find in nature, as well as fertilizers you produce or purchase, to create the finest ingredients for your potions.


Become a master of craftsmanship! Produce unique equipment and items to survive and succeed in this world. Each new discovery will empower you and push you one step ahead.


Defeat your enemies or empower your allies with magical potions. Stand out and make your name known in this world by preparing mixtures with secret formulas. Create your own potions and gain fame in this mysterious world. Stand out in the dark world with your special mixtures and craft your destiny.


Engage with every creature and entity in the world. Gain their loyalty, learn their secrets, and use this knowledge to pave your way.


Every witch has a cat. Of course, you'll have a cat at home to guide you and keep you company during the darkest times. But legends say that some witches spend so much time with their cats that, when the time comes, they can even transform into a cat themselves.


Become the wealthiest and most renowned person in the town by successfully completing quests. Manage trade and the economy, increase your fortune, and establish your dominance in this world. How you make your name known is up to you. Will you be a benevolent angel of mercy or a dark witch of the shadows? Perhaps you can be both.


Step into a world full of surprises waiting for you around every corner. Each game offers a different adventure; you will encounter new events and quests without getting bored.


Master the dark arts and step into the mysterious world of witches. In this dangerous journey, use both your power and wits to establish dominance.


Master the dark arts, survival, social abilities, farming and more while developing your character. Explore the different skill trees and determine your own destiny. Each step on this path will make you stronger.


Strive to survive in the harsh conditions of the Middle Ages. Craft your potions and gain money for better clothes and home. Maybe you can use your potions for survive too.


Enhance your social skills and make your name known in the town. Every interaction and trade makes you more recognizable and allows you to hold the fate of the town in your hands.


Interact with your surroundings and other characters to change the course of events. Use your social skills to forge friendships or defeat your enemies.

name: Witchcraft Tales

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 3.3GHz or MAD @3.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible GPU, 6GB dedicated VRAM (GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Though not required, SSD for storage and 16 GB of memory is recommended.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5/i7 @ 4GHz or Ryzen 5 @ 4GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 12 compatible GPU, 8GB dedicated VRAM (GeForce GTX 1660 / Radeon RX 590)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Though not required, SSD for storage is recommended.
